briefdescription.para: Define I2S control commands for common usage.
Define I2S control commands for master usage.
Get current device status.

listitem.para: Param usage : store result of current status

briefdescription.para: Set I2S transmit success callback function when all required bytes are transmitted for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : transmit success callback function for I2S

briefdescription.para: Set I2S receive success callback function when all required bytes are received for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : receive success callback function for I2S

briefdescription.para: Set I2S transfer error callback function when something error happened for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : transfer error callback function for I2S

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable transmit interrupt.

listitem.para: Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable receive interrupt.

listitem.para: Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag

briefdescription.para: Do a software reset for I2S device, it will stop current transfer, and clear error state and bring device to normal state, set next condition to STOP.
Flush I2S device transmit buffer or fifo.
Flush I2S device receive buffer or fifo.
Enable I2S device.

listitem.para: Param usage : Specified device channel number

briefdescription.para: Disable I2S device, when device is disabled, only I2S_CMD_ENA_DEV, I2S_CMD_DIS_DEV, I2S_CMD_GET_STATUS and I2S_CMD_RESET commands can be executed, other commands will return E_SYS.

listitem.para: Param usage : Specified device channel number

briefdescription.para: Set buffer for interrupt transmit, and it will set tx_buf.

listitem.para: I2S transmitter command If setting TX buffer to NULL, when tx interrupt is enabled and entered into tx interrupt, it will automatically disable the tx interrupt, so when you want to transfer something, you need to set the tx buffer to Non-NULL and enable tx interrupt, when the tx buffer is sent, it will disable the tx interrupt and call tx callback function if available.
Param usage : buffer structure pointer, if param is NULL, then it will set tx_buf to NULL

briefdescription.para: Set buffer for interrupt receive, and it will set rx_buf.

listitem.para: I2S receiver command Similiar to I2S_CMD_SET_TXINT_BUF
Param usage : buffer structure pointer, if param is NULL, then it will set rx_buf to NULL

briefdescription.para: Set buffer empty threshold in the TX FIFO, these bit program the empty trigger level in the TX FIFO.

listitem.para: I2S transmitter command These command is used to set trigger level in the TX FIFO at which empty threshold reached flag/interrupt is generated.
Param usage : Specified trigger level value (16b) + channel (16b)

briefdescription.para: Set buffer available data threshold in the TX FIFO, these bit program the trigger level in the RX FIFO.

listitem.para: I2S receiver command These command is used to set trigger level in the RX FIFO at which received data available flag/interrupt is generated.
Param usage : Specified trigger level value (16b) + channel (16b)

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable clock for master.

listitem.para: Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag

briefdescription.para: Program the number of sclk cycles for word select line stays.
Program the number of gating of sclk cycles for word select line stays.

listitem.para: Param usage : gating of sclk cycles

briefdescription.para: Set extra information pointer of I2S.
Get extra information pointer of I2S.

detaileddescription.para: Currently in I2S device free state
Currently in I2S master transmit state
Currently in I2S master receive state
Currently in I2S device free state

briefdescription.para: I2S information struct definition.

detaileddescription.para: informations about I2S open state, working state, baurate, I2S registers, working method, interrupt number

briefdescription.para: I2S device interface definition.

detaileddescription.para:
define I2S device interface, like I2S information structure, fuctions to get I2S info, open/close/control I2S, send/receive data by I2S
all this details are implemented by user in user porting code

briefdescription.para: get an i2s device by i2s device id.

detaileddescription.para:
For how to use i2s device hal refer to \ref DEVICE_HAL_I2S_DEVSTRUCT "Functions in i2s device structure"
i2s_id
id of i2s, defined by user
!NULL
pointer to an i2s device structure
NULL
failed to find the i2s device by i2s_id
need to implemented by user in user code get an i2s device by i2s device id.

briefdescription.para: I2S device hardware layer definitions.

detaileddescription.para: Provide common definitions for I2S device, then software developer can develop I2S driver following this definitions, and the applications can directly call this definition to realize functions
